Date.description: Date when the match was played

Venue.description: Location where the match was played

Batter.description: Name of the player who is batting

Bowler.description: Name of the player who is bowling

Batter Runs.description: Runs scored by the batter from the ball

Extra Runs.description: Extra runs scored from the ball

Runs From Ball.description: Total runs scored from the ball including batter runs and extra runs

Ball Rebowled.description: Indicates if the ball was rebowled

Extra Type.description: Type of extra run if any

value_dict.['wides']: Extra runs due to wide ball
value_dict.['legbyes']: Extra runs due to leg byes
value_dict.['noballs']: Extra runs due to no ball
value_dict.['byes', 'noballs']: Extra runs due to byes and no ball
value_dict.['legbyes', 'noballs']: Extra runs due to leg byes and no ball
value_dict.['noballs', 'byes']: Extra runs due to no ball and byes
value_dict.['noballs', 'penalty']: Extra runs due to no ball and penalty

Wicket.description: Indicates if a wicket fell on the ball

Method.description: Method of dismissal if a wicket fell

Player Out.description: Name of the player who got out

Innings Runs.description: Total runs scored in the innings till that ball

Innings Wickets.description: Total wickets fallen in the innings till that ball

Target Score.description: Score that the batting team is chasing

Runs to Get.description: Runs required to win the match at that point

Balls Remaining.description: Balls remaining in the match at that point

Chased Successfully.description: Indicates if the target was successfully chased

value_dict.0: The target was not successfully chased

Total Batter Runs.description: Total runs scored by the batter in the match till that ball

Total Non Striker Runs.description: Total runs scored by the non-striker in the match till that ball

Batter Balls Faced.description: Total balls faced by the batter in the match till that ball

Non Striker Balls Faced.description: Total balls faced by the non-striker in the match till that ball

Player Out Runs.description: Runs scored by the player who got out

Player Out Balls Faced.description: Balls faced by the player who got out

Bowler Runs Conceded.description: Runs conceded by the bowler in the match till that ball

Valid Ball.description: Indicates if the ball bowled was valid

value_dict.0: The ball bowled was not valid

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in cricket match analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the cricket match, please predict if the target was successfully chased.
prompt.answer_prompt: The target was successfully chased[1] or not[0]?

class_value_dict.0: The target was not successfully chased

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in cricket match analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the cricket match, please predict the runs made in the innings.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in cricket match analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the cricket match, please predict the runs required to win.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in cricket match analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the cricket match, please predict the total runs made by the batter.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in cricket match analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the cricket match, please predict the total runs made by the non-striker.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in cricket match analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the cricket match, please predict the total runs conceded by the bowler.
